articles.author: Sébastian SEIBT
articles.title: Why Russia may have turned to dart‑frog toxin epibatidine to poison Navalny - France 24
articles.description: Two years after Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny died in prison, five European countries claim they have identified the substance that killed him: epibatidine, an extremely lethal toxin produced by the South American poison dart frog. But why go throu…
articles.content: Two days prior to the two-year anniversary of Alexei Navalny's sudden death in a Russian prison, Britain, France, Germany, The Netherlands and Sweden on Saturday presented the conclusion of their joi… [+5795 chars]
